TermDefinition.DefinitionText: In mycosis fungoides, an area of skin that is thickened, raised, red, scaly, and itchy.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "mycosis fungoides plaque"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "micosis fungoide en placas"
